plot: Cat Eyed Boy is shunned by humans for being too monstrous and shunned by demons for being too human. He travels Japan, taking up uninvited residence in the attics of unsuspecting families but wherever he goes, something frightening and tragic is bound to occur - sometimes Cat Eyed Boy intervenes on behalf of the victims and sometimes he merely observes. Amongst the demons he encounters are the 1000 Hand Monster, the Tsunami Summoners, Meatball Monster, Insect Man, Shadow Boy and the Band Of One Hundred Monsters. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Nekome Kozou" (猫目小僧) by Columbia Yurikago Kai & Mitsuko Horie
